title: Only 444 Different T206 cards remain for your browsing pleasure
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Only 444 Different T206 cards remain for your browsing pleasure
posts.post_content:
Addendum #7 - Rules are meant to be broken, so there are very few.  Ask about any card you want, not just the original twenty on the list.  A couple of back scans are paired with the wrong front (perhaps more), Ames Hands over and Kelley so far.  I plan to respond promptly at this point.  The initial rush was a bit trying in this regard. 

 I will be traveling from Feb 16th until Feb 26th.  I will attempt to keep up with inquiries during this 11 day span, but no cards will be shipped during my travels.  Thanks for your understanding.  

I expect that all parcels mailed should be received by Friday, tomorrow.  Let me know if you haven’t received yours yet.

Addendum #6 - What we need is some images, so have a Ball for $160

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10028/ball-cle[/IMG]

or cross Criss off your list for $75

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/37492/criss[/IMG]

or place your bet and pick a Chick for $360

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10249/gandil[/IMG]

or any of the other 447 available

Addendum #5 - No sales during Super Bowl.  I wonder why.  20 parcels have been shipped on or before Saturday.  If you have any concern about the location of your parcel, I have a complete list of shipping dates and tracking numbers.  I have freed up some space in my inbox, so responding by email, PM or in the thread is fine.
I am still waiting for one check in the mail for a shipped item, but I will contact that buyer privately if it doesn't come today.  66 cards have been sold or pending so far   Thanks to everyone for their interest, purchases, patience and understanding.

Addendum #4 - I am shifting the bulk of communication, negotiation, notification and complaints to email either through Net54 email link or directly to [url]fburkett54@gmail.com[/url].  Once I get over 400 PMs, they can be downloaded or deleted if no longer relevant, but finding what I need to find becomes harder.
Carry on.  Today is the last shipping day this week.:D

Addendum #3 - 14 parcels have been shipped.  The following cards have been sold.

and 14 other pending sales

Addendum #2 - Shipping has started.  I am keeping tracking numbers and will know when you receive your cards.  You needn't send a note to that effect to let me keep some room in my inbox.  Of course if there is a problem let me know, but let's do the "problem" correspondence via email thru Net54.  FYI we are approaching 250 PMs in less than 3 days.  Thanks to all for your patience. 

Addendum #1 - Due to sequential purchases by the same buyers I am slowing down the packing and shipping process to combine orders before shipping.  As many of you know, this is not my standard MO.  I appreciate your patience and your purchases.  I have tried to keep up with all the PMs (over 100 in 1 1/2 days), but if you do not hear from me within 24 hours, drop me an email or PM reminder through the net54 system.  

I am more sympathetic with auction house errors due to volume than in the past.  I am trying to give the first inquiry the priority on any given card, but I'm not sure that a mistake will not occur.  Until this endeavor I thought I was perfect.:D

If you buy a card that has already been sold, a full refund is in order.  

Thanks for your patience and understanding.


I will be selling or consigning the vast majority of my Monster
All the cards have scans posted on Collectorfocus.com.
My collection is titled TOBACCO ROAD.
Roughly half the cards are graded by SGC and can be seen at
[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/frankbmd/t206-sgc[/url]
The other T206 categories are defined by TPG, if you return to the category list in the link above.
The following twenty cards are listed here as Lot A.
All the Lot A cards are available each for $105.00 shipped by PayPal F&F or other forms of no fee payment.
Shipping for multiple cards (valued at $100 each) will be reduced based on actual cost of shipping for larger lots.
If this method is successful Lots B-Z will follow once only five cards remain available in the current lot.
Fell free to browse the entire set of scans and if something catches you eye, feel free to inquire.  I haven't decided what to keep, but do have a target price for sales in the next few months, well below the value of the entire set.
I request all correspondence via PM, but of course buyers are welcome to bump the thread, which I will follow.  
The average grade of the whole set is 4.1.  Only two cards are not graded.
 

Abstein                 P350GAI6
Barger                 P350SGC5
BridwellCap                 P460SGC5
ClarkeColumbus         P350SGC5
ConroyBat                 SC350SGC5
CrandallCap                 SC460SGC5
DowneyFielding         P350SGC5
Gibson                 P150SGC4.5
HerzogBoston         P460SGC4.5
I HoffmanProv                 P350SGC5
HowellPortrait         P350SGC5
McGinley                 SC350SGC5
Schlafly                 P350SGC5
Stephens                 P350SGC5
TannehillNo “L"         P460SGC5


Thanks for taking a peek.

I have received 16 inquiries so far via PM as requested.  Some cards have multiple requests.  I will respond to each PM in the order received.  This may take a while.  Be patient.
PM Sent
Great prices.  I’ll be watching the future lots for SGC cards I need to add for my HOF collection.
PM sent
PM sent
PM sent
Pm sent
Pm sent
PM sent
PM sent last night
PM sent.
PM sent.
say it aint so, Frank!  Your dwindling monster #!!!!!
Thanks Frank.  Appreciate you reaching out.
Pm Sent

Frank,

I hope you are doing well.  Selling or consigning most or all of your T206 collection is an undertaking, and no doubt the set took many years to collect.  Wishing you the very best with the sales.

Frank, sent a PM and email and received no response.  I suspect you did not receive them, as this has happened a lot with my account lately. Please contact me at [url]drumback2@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks.

Mark
Sent PM days ago and no response. FYI. I’m sure getting flooded.

Received my card, thanks Frank!!
Received mine as well. Thank you!
I received my card today.  Frank’s excellent to work with and very good turnaround.  You maybe hearing more from me soon sir.  Thank you.

Easy to work with, well packed and great turnaround.  He’s lightning fast for moving so many pieces at once.

I didn't intend to scare you away with my upcoming trip.  So the plan going forward is to start a new thread by the end of the month, 2/27, 2/28 or 2/29.

A selection of cards (5-10) will be offered each week with scans and individually pricing.  There will also be a special price for all the cards that will be available for one week only.

Individual sales will still be welcome with subsequent revisions in the whole lot price until the end of the week.  Of course inquiries about cards not part of the weekly packages will be answered.

I look forward to working with you as we "leap" into the next phase of the sale.
